snippet: South Sudan, which gained independence from Sudan last year, objected to a United Nations report raising allegations of atrocities by South Sudan’s army.
abstract: South Sudan expels United Nations human rights officer after government objects to report raising allegations of atrocities by South Sudan's army.
lead_paragraph: South Sudan, which gained independence from Sudan last year, objected to a United Nations report raising allegations of atrocities by South Sudan’s army.
